org.jooq
Interface Query

All Superinterfaces:
QueryPartProvider, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
DeleteQuery<R>, InsertQuery<R>, InsertSelectQuery, Select<R>, SelectConditionStep, SelectFinalStep, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectHavingStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectLimitStep, SelectOrderByStep, SelectQuery, SelectWhereStep, SimpleSelectConditionStep<R>, SimpleSelectFinalStep<R>, SimpleSelectLimitStep<R>, SimpleSelectOrderByStep<R>, SimpleSelectQuery<R>, SimpleSelectWhereStep<R>, StoreQuery<R>, UpdateQuery<R>

extends QueryPartProvider

Methods inherited from interface org.jooq.QueryPartProvider
getQueryPart
 

Method Detail

execute

int execute()
            throws java.sql.SQLException
Execute the query, if it has been created with a properly configured factory

Returns:
A result value, depending on the concrete implementation of Query:
  • SelectQuery : the number of resulting records
  • UpdateQuery : the number of updated records
  • InsertQuery : the number of inserted records
  • DeleteQuery : the number of deleted records
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
#execute(Connection)}

getConfiguration

@Deprecated
Configuration getConfiguration()
Deprecated. 1.5.2 This configuration should not be accessed publicly anymore from a query

Retrieve the underlying configuration of this query
